description: Xavier Hux has the agility of a spider -- this guy can move around a mattress, but that shouldn’t come as a surprise when checking out the body he has. More than that he’s skilled at moving around his body for his lover -- that’s where Jimmie Slater comes into play. These two have similar body types, and Xavier uses his nimbleness to his full advantage (and the pleasure of Jimmie Slater) by maneuvering his body into all kinds of accessible poses for Jimmie -- guaranteeing that Jimmie gets as deep into Xavier’s ass as possible during bareback sex!
title: Xavier Hux Makes His Lucas Entertainment Debut With Jimmie Slater
